abstract: Informational and game apps provide news updates, tell the “Star Wars” story and offer opportunities to act out the popular movie franchise.
snippet: Informational and game apps provide news updates, tell the “Star Wars” story and offer opportunities to act out the popular movie franchise.
lead_paragraph: In 1977, the spines of millions of moviegoers shivered as the words “A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away… ” crawled up the screen at the beginning of the original “Star Wars” movie. In two weeks, that same sensation is set to unfold again when “Star Wars: The Force Awakens” hits theaters worldwide.

headline.main: Video Feature: ‘Star Wars’ Apps Keep the Force With You Till Movie Arrives
headline.print_headline: Keeping the Force With You Till the Movie Arrives
